name: zelda-api

description: Get information from the Zelda Fan API
author: JoepSnijders

commands.name: find-zelda
commands.title: Find Zelda
commands.subtitle: Get information from the Zelda API
commands.description: This command is a Raycast interface for the Zelda API

commands.name: find-boss
